dashboard.assistantBackground: AI assistant updates data in the background.
dashboard.firstProject: Create your first project to start editing clips.
dashboard.emptyProjectsDescription: Start with your first project. Import a local file or a YouTube link and the workspace will be prepared automatically.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Create, refine and export clips with semantic precision.

news.title: News
news.description: Trends and insights for short-form and AI clip editing.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: What's new in Cursed Clipper: features, UX, and generation quality.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Runtime, imports and media tooling configuration.

settings.runtimeDescription: FFmpeg, FFprobe and yt-dlp status for import and media processing.
settings.systemModeHidden: `System` mode is hidden because yt-dlp is not found in PATH.
settings.folderPlaceholder: Leave empty for the app-managed path
settings.securityHint: Tools are executed only in Rust backend.
settings.languageDescription: Default is English. You can switch at any time.

mode.managedHint: The app installs and updates yt-dlp automatically.
mode.customHint: Use your own yt-dlp binary path.
mode.systemHint: Use yt-dlp from operating system PATH.

modeDescriptions.video: Work with source video: transcript, semantics and precise clip cutting.
modeDescriptions.clips: Full assembly editing with video/audio tracks and layered timeline.
modeDescriptions.export: Per-clip title, description, tags and platform setup.
modeDescriptions.insights: Viral score, hooks, content plan and publish series.
modeDescriptions.thumbnails: Live cover templates with editable overlays.

clipsMode.emptyStateCreateInEditor: Create clips in the Editor mode.
clipsMode.previewHintSelectItem: Select a timeline item linked to a clip to preview.

videoMode.selectionHint: Select words in transcript or a range on the timeline.
videoMode.aboutVideoDescription: Mock analytics starts automatically after file upload. Transcript is started manually.
videoMode.statusFinalizingAnalysis: AI is finalizing scene and rhythm analysis...
videoMode.analysisAfterMetadata: Analysis appears right after video metadata is read.
videoMode.transcriptNotStartedDescription: Start speech recognition first. Then words, timecodes and cutting blocks will appear.
videoMode.timecodeClippingDescription: Set start and end of the range, then create a clip.
videoMode.rangeTooShortError: Range is too short for a clip.
videoMode.createClipFromRangeError: Failed to create a clip from this range.
videoMode.uploadSourceVideoHint: After upload, AI analyzes video automatically. You start transcription manually.
videoMode.subtitlesOnlyInAssembly: Subtitles apply only in Clip assembly mode.

multitrackTimeline.releaseToCreateVideoTrack: Release mouse: create a new video track above

clipSceneEditor.nudgeLeft: Move clip left by one frame (←), Alt+← = 0.2s
clipSceneEditor.nudgeRight: Move clip right by one frame (→), Alt+→ = 0.2s
clipSceneEditor.interactionHint: Frame drag, Ctrl+wheel zoom, subtitle drag/resize ({{resolution}})

appShell.sourceNotReadyMissing: Project video source was not found. Check import.
appShell.patchNotSavedDescription: Failed to save project changes to database.
appShell.projectDeletedDescription: Project and related state were removed from workspace.
appShell.deleteFailedDescription: Failed to delete project from database.
appShell.deleteRolledBackDescription: Project "{{name}}" was restored after delete error.
appShell.projectCreatedDescription: New project "{{name}}" was added to workspace.

workspaceView.usingOriginalFileDescription: Failed to copy file into projects, continuing without staging.
workspaceView.videoLoadFailedDescription: Check file access and try again.
workspaceView.connectingProjectMediaDescription: Loading video source and syncing workspace state.
workspaceView.restoringProjectDescription: Loading video, clips and context from saved state.
workspaceView.systemContextConnecting: Connecting video source and validating project context.
workspaceView.systemContextRestoring: Restoring saved project data and workspace environment.
workspaceView.compactStatusAiUpdating: AI is updating blocks and metrics...
workspaceView.fileNotFoundDescription: Upload or import video into project first.
workspaceView.saveChangesFailedDescription: Check project storage access and try again.
workspaceView.aiSyncingTimeline: AI is syncing timeline, blocks and virality predictions.

loading.workspaceInitDescription: Initializing transcript, semantic index and clip timeline.

account.notificationsDescription: Receive alerts about new AI tool releases.

projectCard.deleteConfirmDescription: Project "{{name}}" will be deleted with edit state, clips and analysis progress.

createProject.validationNameMin: Project name must be at least 3 characters.
createProject.validationBriefMin: Add a short brief (at least 12 characters) so AI can set context.
createProject.validationSelectLocalFile: Select a video file from device.
createProject.validationSelectYoutubeFormat: Check URL and select an import format.
createProject.projectCreatedYoutubeLinked: Source was added as a YouTube link. Download can be started later.
createProject.projectCreatedDescription: Source connected. You can proceed to editing.
createProject.newProjectDescription: Choose source, validate format and launch workspace.
createProject.noDirectMp4WithAudio: No direct MP4 with audio found. Video stream will be used and audio added automatically on download.
createProject.noFormats: No suitable video formats found. Try another URL or update yt-dlp/FFmpeg.
createProject.downloadOnCreate: Download video immediately after project creation
createProject.briefPlaceholder: Describe goal, audience and clipping style.
createProject.briefHint: Brief determines initial AI recommendations and publishing scenario.

analyticsOverview.title: Analytics overview
analyticsOverview.summaryDescription: Summary of source metrics and semantic composition of selected content.

exportMode.templatesUnavailableDescription: Generate covers first in the cover mode.
exportMode.generatedDescriptionFallback: {{projectName}}. Segment {{start}}-{{end}} with a key speaker insight.
exportMode.noSourceDescription: Export requires a local project file.
exportMode.nothingToExportDescription: Select platforms for at least one clip.
exportMode.subtitlesUnavailableDescription: Failed to resolve active subtitle preset.
exportMode.noSubtitleDataDescription: For subtitle exports, run transcription first.
exportMode.emptyState: Create at least one clip to open export.
exportMode.title: Clip export
exportMode.description: Configure metadata, platforms, and per-platform covers for each clip.
exportMode.subtitleHint: Subtitles are exported only for clips where they are enabled in assembly mode.

clipsContextPanel.title: Clip editor
clipsContextPanel.noActiveClip: Select a clip in the list on the left
clipsContextPanel.parametersDescription: Changes apply instantly to preview and export.
clipsContextPanel.subtitlesUnavailableDescription: Transcription is required first. Run speech recognition in Editor mode.
clipsContextPanel.subtitleHint: Position is set by mouse drag in preview. Resize with handles or sliders.

exportContextPanel.title: Export context
exportContextPanel.metadataDescription: Fill title, description, and tags for each clip in the Export section.
exportContextPanel.outputProfileDescription: Platforms are selected per clip and do not mix with other modes.

videoContextPanel.sourceDescription: New video automatically starts mock analysis. Transcription starts manually.
videoContextPanel.semanticBlocksEmpty: Blocks will appear after transcription starts.

hooksPanel.title: Hook generator
hooksPanel.description: AI ranking of opening lines for short-form retention.

viralScorePanel.title: Viral index
viralScorePanel.summaryProcessing: AI evaluates hook retention, pacing, and rewatch probability.
viralScorePanel.summaryReady: The index combines opening strength, narrative density, and rewatch potential.

contentPlanPanel.title: Content plan generator
contentPlanPanel.description: Strategic publishing ideas aligned to semantic dynamics of the video.

seriesSegmentationPanel.title: Series segmentation
seriesSegmentationPanel.description: Episodes automatically assembled from semantic blocks of the video.

exportPresetsPanel.title: Export platforms
exportPresetsPanel.description: Export to multiple platforms with preset duration and format limits.

thumbnailGeneratorPanel.emptyDescription: Generate templates to start editing covers.
thumbnailGeneratorPanel.noTemplatesYet: No templates yet. Click Generate to create the first cover set.
thumbnailGeneratorPanel.loadMetadataFirst: Load video metadata first, then generate cover templates.
thumbnailGeneratorPanel.description: AI picks the frame while you edit title and switch template.

thumbnailsContextPanel.activeTemplateApplied: Active template is applied to the clip in the current export scenario.
thumbnailsContextPanel.aiRecommendationBody: For Shorts and TikTok, use a high-contrast title up to 4 words and keep focus center between 18% and 32% of timeline.

subtitlePresetsPanel.title: Subtitle presets
subtitlePresetsPanel.description: Typographic styles for different platforms and readability scenarios.

sub_cinematic.name: Cinematic minimal
sub_cinematic.description: Soft shadow, high contrast, smooth phrase flow.
sub_cinematic.styleSample: This is where the idea becomes clear.

sub_punch.name: Accent words
sub_punch.description: Key words are subtly enhanced in speech rhythm.

sub_clean.name: Clean universal
sub_clean.description: Compact style for dense informational content.
